title: EventTracker
description: Location-based event discovery platform with interactive map interface, custom clustering, and real-time filtering using Mapbox GL JS.
details:
EventTracker is a comprehensive platform for discovering and managing events based on location. 

Key Features:
• Interactive map with custom clustering algorithm
• Real-time filtering by date, category, and distance
• Geospatial querying for efficient location-based searches
• Comprehensive event management system
• Admin dashboard with real-time analytics

This project showcases my ability to work with complex mapping libraries while maintaining a clean, intuitive user interface. The backend implements efficient geospatial queries to handle thousands of events without performance degradation.

title: MySQL Table Viewer
description: Full-stack database visualization tool built with React (Vite), Node.js, and MySQL for real-time database visualization.
details:
MySQL Table Viewer is a comprehensive database visualization tool that makes it easy to understand complex database structures.

Key Features:
• Intuitive interface for visualizing database tables and relationships
• Support for one-to-many and many-to-many relationships
• Real-time updates when database structure changes
• Split-view layout for simultaneous viewing of data and structure
• Custom RESTful API endpoints for efficient data retrieval

This project demonstrates my backend skills with Node.js/Express and database management with MySQL, while also showcasing my ability to create clean, intuitive interfaces for complex data visualization.

title: CasaLink
description: Real estate marketplace application built with React and Firebase V9, enabling users to list and search properties through an interactive platform.
details:
CasaLink is a full-featured real estate marketplace that connects property owners with potential buyers and renters.

Key Features:
• User authentication system with Google OAuth
• Interactive property listings with geolocation services
• Real-time listing updates and image upload functionality
• Advanced property search with multiple filters
• Secure messaging system between users

This project showcases my ability to build a complete marketplace application with user authentication, real-time updates, and location-based features using Firebase and React.
